SEARCH

Package com.icx.dom.domain.sql

package com.icx.dom.domain.sql
Domain controller (SqlDomainController), base class for domain classes (SqlDomainObject) and internal classes for SQL based persistence mechanism.
Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.icx.dom.domain
    Base domain controller (DomainController), base class for domain classes (DomainObject) and internal classes for Domain persistence mechanism.
    com.icx.dom.domain.sql.tools
    Java2Sql tool and related classes.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ComplexFieldHelpers
    Helpers for conversion of collections and maps to/from associated rows of entry tables
    Const
    Constants names of columns and fields
    DeleteHelpers
    Helpers for deleting objects.
    FieldError
    Error description which will be associated to a field of a specific domain object on problems saving or loading field data to/from database
    Helpers
    Field/column conversion and general helpers
    LoadHelpers
    Helpers for loading domain objects from database
    SaveHelpers
    Helpers for saving domain objects to database
    SqlDomainController
    Domain controller DomainController for SQL based persistence mechanism.
    SqlDomainObject
    Base class for objects managed by SqlDomainController.
    SqlRegistry
    Singleton to register Java class/SQL table and field/column associations.
